title: Second beta of Studio Display Firmware 15.5 seems to improve the webcam a bit more
content:
Apple last week released a new beta firmware for Studio Display, which the company later confirmed addresses some of the webcam quality issues. With the release of macOS 12.4 beta 3 earlier today, Apple also made the second beta of Studio Display Firmware 15.5 available to developers – and it seems to improve the camera a bit more.

more…

The post Second beta of Studio Display Firmware 15.5 seems to improve the webcam a bit more appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple made the second beta of Studio Display Firmware 15.5 available to developers – and it seems to improve the camera a bit more.
